item.title: 9.30 alpha
item.description:
Version 9.30 alpha erschienen.

Changelog:

  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.26 alpha - 9.29 alpha versions was fixed. These alpha versions could not open non-solid 7z archive, if some files were skipped during creation of that archive. That problem is also related to 7z archives created in solid mode, if each solid block contains no more than one file. Note: 7-Zip skips files that were open for writing by another application and shows warning in that case.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 26. Oktober 2012

item.title: 9.28 alpha
item.description:
Version 9.28 alpha erschienen.

Changelog:

  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.26 alpha - 9.29 alpha versions was fixed. These alpha versions could not open non-solid 7z archive, if some files were skipped during creation of that archive. That problem is also related to 7z archives created in solid mode, if each solid block contains no more than one file. Note: 7-Zip skips files that were open for writing by another application and shows warning in that case.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 20. Juni 2012

item.title: 9.25 alpha
item.description:
Version 9.25 alpha erschienen.

Changelog:

  • LZMA decompression speed was improved.
  • "compress and send to email" code was improved to support more email clients.
  • New command "h" to calculate hash values CRC-32, CRC-64, SHA-256 or SHA-1 for files on disk.
  • New -spf switch to store full file paths including drive letter to archive. If you use that switch with extract command, please check that file names in archive are correct.
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 16. September 2011

item.title: 9.22 beta
item.description:
Version 9.22 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now uses progress indicator displayed on a taskbar button under Windows 7.
  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.21 beta was fixed: 7-Zip could ignore some options when you created ZIP archives. For example, it could use ZipCrypto cipher instead of AES-256.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 18. April 2011

Version 9.20 erschienen.

Changelog:

  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 18. November 2010

item.title: 9.19 beta
item.description:
Version 9.19 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • The console version now doesn't show entered password.
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 11. November 2010

item.title: 9.18 beta
item.description:
Version 9.16 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now can unpack SquashFS and CramFS filesystem images.
  • 7-Zip now can unpack some TAR and ISO archives with incorrect headers.
  • New small SFX module for installers (in Extra package).
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 02. November 2010

item.title: 9.17 beta
item.description:
Version 9.16 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • Disk fragmentation problem for ZIP archives created by 7-Zip was fixed.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 04. Oktober 2010

item.title: 9.16 beta
item.description:
Version 9.16 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now supports files that are larger than 8 GB in TAR archives.
  • NSIS support was improved.
  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localizations: Hindi, Gujarati, Sanskrit.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 08. September 2010

Version 9.15 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localization: Tatar

item.description:
Version 9.14 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • WIM support was improved.

Datum: 04. Juni 2010

item.title: 9.13 beta
item.description:
Version 9.13 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now stores NTFS file timestamps to ZIP archives.
  • New additional "Open archive >" item in context menu allows to select archive type for some files.
  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localization: Uyghur.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 15. April 2010

item.title: 9.12 beta
item.description:
Version 9.12 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • ZIP / PPMd compression ratio was improved in Maximum and Ultra modes.
  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.* beta was fixed: LZMA2 codec didn't work, if more than 10 threads were used (or more than 20 threads in some modes).

zum Download

 

Datum: 24. März 2010

item.title: 9.11 beta
item.description:
Version 9.11 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now supports PPMd compression in ZIP archives.
  • Speed optimizations in PPMd codec.
  • The support for archives in installers was improved.
  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localization: Kazakh.

zum Download

 

Datum: 15. März 2010
